listitem.simpara: The package univention-server has been migrated to Python 3 (53348).
Timestamps have been added to the log output of the server password change (53182).
The package univention-network-manager has been migrated to Python 3 (53347).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).

listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 5.0-0 are included:

listitem.simpara: isc-dhcp (53469)

listitem.para:
The following updated packages from Debian Buster 10.11 are included (54218):
ansible apt aspell atftp awstats base-files btrbk c-ares clamav clevis commons-io connman crmsh cyrus-imapd debconf debian-installer-netboot-images distcc distro-info-data dnspython dput-ng espeak-ng eterm exactimage exiv2 ffmpeg fig2dev fluidsynth freediameter fwupd-amd64-signed fwupdate-amd64-signed fwupdate fwupd gcc-mingw-w64 golang-github-docker-docker-credential-helpers grilo gthumb hg-git htmldoc htslib http-parser hyperkitty ipmitool ircii irssi isync jackson-databind java-atk-wrapper jetty9 ledgersmb lemonldap-ng libbusiness-us-usps-webtools-perl libdatetime-timezone-perl libgetdata libmateweather libpam-tacplus libspf2 libuv1 libxml-security-java libxstream-java liferea linuxptp lynx mailman mediawiki modsecurity-crs mqtt-client mumble mupdf neutron nextcloud-desktop nginx nmap node-ansi-regex node-axios node-glob-parent node-handlebars node-hosted-git-info node-jszip node-redis node-tar node-ws nvidia-cuda-toolkit nvidia-graphics-drivers-legacy-390xx nvidia-graphics-drivers opendmarc openjdk-11-jre-dcevm openjdk-11 openvpn php-horde-text-filter plinth postorius proftpd-dfsg prosody psmisc python-uflash rails redis request-tracker4 ring roundcube ruby-kaminari ruby-websocket-extensions rust-rustyline rxvt-unicode sabnzbdplus salt scrollz shim-helpers-amd64-signed shim shim-signed shiro speedtest-cli squashfs-tools strongswan thunderbird tnef tomcat9 tor trafficserver tzdata ublock-origin uim ulfius user-mode-linux velocity webkit2gtk wml wordpress xen xfce4-weather-plugin xmlgraphics-commons yubikey-manager

The following packages have been moved to the maintained repository of UCS:
univention-tftp (35487)

listitem.simpara: Always call the UCR module function handler() with a dictionary mapping variables to a 2-tuple containing the old and new value, even when ucr commit or ucr register are invoked (53424).
UCR now exits with an exit code of 1 when setting at least UCR variable fails (53742).
Umlauts in UCR keys are allowed again, which was broken since UCS 5.0-1 (53742).
The package univention-base-files has been migrated to Python 3 (53343).
Update file last_id atomically (51910).
Log error if listener/listener file cannot be written (51910).
Consistently write <TransID> if last_id could not be determined as all (51910).
Check listener/listener.priv file too if getting last_id failed (51910).
Check listener/listener file if getting last_id failed (51910).
Log messages of univention-translog have been improved (51911, 49430).
The script univention-translog now also checks the file listener/listener.priv if that exists (51911, 49430).
The script univention-translog recognizes the special values <TransID> and 0 and is able to fix them (51911, 49430).
Restarting the systemd unit is now limited to 50 times in an observation window of 1000 seconds (51911, 49430).
The notifier aborts if the transaction ID issued by the OpenLDAP translog overlay is not a valid integer (51911, 49430).
Make module execution order configurable by explicitly specifying a priority (26089).
The applying of a failed.ldif has been repaired, it was broken due to the Python 3 migration (53430).
Make module execution order configurable by explicitly specifying a `priority` (26089).

Make standard IO unbuffered. Otherwise (error) output from modules is buffered until the 8 KiB buffer becomes full. Only then the buffer is full, the previously collected output will be flushed and becomes visible en bloc in the log file /var/log/univention/listener.log (53071).
Server password change now logs timestamps (53182).
The configuration of log rotation for the UDM REST API logfiles has been added (51721).
The style of the module tabs when using the query parameter overview=false has been adjusted (53906).
The Caching settings of &ucsUMC; have been enhanced and relaxed to fix Caching issues after the upgrade to UCS 5.0 (53465).
The widgets DateBox and TimeBox now handle empty values correctly and support the syntax date2 again (53631).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).
The login page no longer has the Login entry in the menu (53728).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
A new &ucsUCRV; ucs/web/theme has been added to configure a theme for all UCS web interfaces. The dark theme is the default (53307).
A regression where a saved username in Firefox is entered into a wrong input field has been fixed (53310).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
Improved performance during drag and drop (53565).
When using the portal for the first time, a sane guess which locale to set is made (53565).
Changed the position of the button to leave the edit mode (53565).
When entering edit mode, the portal overview is focused and the sidebar with portal attributes is not automatically opened anymore (53565).
Added an error message if the portal data cannot be loaded (53565).
Improved error validation in change password form (53565).
Added a new widget for localization of certain attributes (53565).
Added the option to connect groups to a tile. The tile is only visible to users of these groups (53565).
Users now can choose to deleting an object entirely when removing (not just unlinking) (53565).
Improved tile describing tooltip in mobile mode (53565).
Close folder when switching to an embedded link (53565).
Switch to portal overview when using the search bar (53565).
Close search bar when opening embedded links (53565).
Re-ordering of tiles now works within a folder (53565).
New translation system (53565).
Improved keyboard controls, including a drag and drop alternative (53565).
Various accessibility fixes (53565).
Various CSS fixes (53565, 53385, 53491).
The template /usr/share/univention-portal/apps.json was unused and has been removed (53651).
Tabs are now shown with a full tile with background, not just the logo (53385, 53491).
The portal can now be themed (53385, 53491).
Language menu is now only available if the portal supports more than one language; the selected language is disabled in the menu (53385, 53491).
The menu can now be edited in edit mode (53385, 53491).
Added multiple new fields in edit mode (53385, 53491).
Various accessibility fixes, like aria attributes (53385, 53491).
Cookie Banner now better fits the portal layout (53385, 53491).
Manage tabulator index for all components (53385, 53491).
Added indicator for folders exceeding 9 entries (53385, 53491).
Removed console.log messages (53385, 53491).
Edit modals cannot be closed when clicking the background; New layer for loading animation (53385, 53491).
Improved form validations (53385, 53491).
Improve portal header in mobile mode (53385, 53491).
Fix sizing in mobile mode (53385, 53491).
All notifications can now be removed at once (53385, 53491).
Notifications are shown in edit mode (53385, 53491).
Notifications and tabs now have a counter in the header bar (53385, 53491).
Notifications now hides automatically (53385, 53491).
When being logged in via SAML a refresh of the SAML authentication at the UMC server (or LDAP server) is now done correctly again after the validity of the SAML message expired (52888).
The behavior for multiple module tabs has been adjusted when using the query parameter `overview=false` (53906).
The Caching settings of &ucsUMC; have been enhanced and relaxed to fix Caching issues after the upgrade to UCS 5.0 (53465).
The traceback format of exceptions occurring in a thread has been repaired (53817).
The UMC server is now capable to send responses with mime type image/svg+xml (53779).
The label of required multi valued widgets is now highlighted if no value is set (53665).
The login page no longer has the entry Login in the menu (53728).
Access to the &ucsUMC; has been repaired if the user is allowed to use only one UMC module which does not have a flavor (51659).
SAML logouts which are initiated by another service provider are now correctly handled (53436).
The new &ucsUCRV; umc/http/enforce-secure-cookie can be set to make cookies secure when using a HTTPS connection (51242).
The new &ucsUCRV; umc/http/enforce-session-cookie can be set to make the login cookie a session cookie. Closing the browser will delete the cookie, effectively logging out the user (53508).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
Remove cache files to force a rebuild with the next access to the cache (51986).
The error handling in case docker inspect fails has been repaired (53803).
Configuring an App that shipped with certain configure scripts did not work. This has been fixed (53761).
The install dialog shows the errors of the installation and messages from the pre-installation script if the installation has failed (53625).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).
The traceback shall be send when an exception arises in install_base (53655).
Fixed a regression where the App installation failed if the App had certain App settings (53630).
The template /usr/share/univention-portal/apps.json was unused and has been removed (53651).
App settings of the scope outside are now applied on the system before the App's preinst script (52506).
App settings were not applied correctly during the installation (53578).
Cache files are now verified using apt-key verify. This will allow us to update signature keys (53526).
An issue has been fixed where certain strings containing apostrophes caused crashes (53412).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
An error has been fixed opening certain Apps (53384).
Installation of certain apps fails, if the app id exceeds a certain limit in length (53273).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: The encoding of computers displayName and krb5PrincipalName allows UTF-8 again, as it has been in UCS 4.4 (53927).
Make LDAP Object Class and Attribute names selectable (53840).
Make options in Extended Attributes selectable (53840).
Add syntax class to select UDM syntax class for Extended Attributes (53840).
Expose the size limit parameter in the simple UDM API (53833).
PDF printers can now be created without specifying a destination (53702).
It is now possible to set an account activation date for users, e.g. via the property accountActivationDate in the UDM module users/user (53631).
The simple UDM API now exposes the remove_childs option of UDM function remove() in the delete() method to recursively delete objects below the DN of the object that is being deleted (53667).
Modifying groups objects without mail addresses in certain situations has been repaired (53653).
Under certain circumstances renaming a computer object was not possible (53642).
Timeout DNS edit operations after 120 seconds (39539).
In the UDM module users/user the property `lockedTime` is now correctly handled in Python 3 (53574).
The uniqueness of groupnames is now also checked when renaming a group (53453).

Since the Python 3 migration broken LDAP filter where generated which contained byte-string-representations for UDM property names which are used in filters. The values are now correctly decoded (53553).

The shell function ucs_registerLDAPExtension from the Univention shell library now allows the option umcmessagecatalog. This option can be used to supply translation files in GNU message catalog format for UMC (53532).
The descriptions of email related attributes have been improved (46080).
UDM now enforces uniqueness of the name of objects in the same sub-tree position (53102).
Users/LDAP objects could not be created if the mspolicy password complexity criteria was configured due to the missing displayname (53339).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: The dependency on python-univention-ipcalc has been fixed (53345).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
The login message (message of the day) showed wrong versions of supported browsers (53244).
The package univention-maintenance-mode has been migrated to Python 3 (53346).
Rebuilt for package ldb update to version 2.2.3 (54013).
The package univention-ldb-modules has been migrated to Python 3 (53567).
An encoding issue has been fixed, which prevented the UMC join module from executing join scripts (53181).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
The system diagnostic check no longer shows false positives when a HTTP proxy is used (50620).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).
It's now possible to select the LDAP server in the policy_result Python library (53943).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).
The package univention-quota has been migrated to Python 3 (51317).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).
The package univention-system-info has been migrated to Python 3 (51321).
While copying an user object the entries were not filled correctly and saving was not possible (53857).
Some colors have been adjusted to use the new UCS 5 colors (53665).
Empty values are now prepended to static values for certain widgets if the syntax class requires this (53631).
Rewriting properties of apps using App Options changed the original options leading to follow up errors especially in the UDM REST API (53714).
The UDM UMC module no longer crashes when a LDAP search syntax uses a LDAP attribute as displayed label (53628).
The user creation wizard now shows the mailPrimaryAdress if it is required. The default value and visibility of widgets in the user creation wizard can now be configured via UCR (53456).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
UDM now enforces uniqueness of the name of objects in the same subtree position (53102).
Added new shell library function echowithtimestamp (53182).
The parsing and generating of fstab entries now rejects more invalid values and generates valid values in certain cases (53902).
The evaluation of deny-lists for shares has been repaired (51650).
The Caching settings of &ucsUMC; have been enhanced and relaxed to fix Caching issues after the upgrade to UCS 5.0 (53465).

The shell function ucs_registerLDAPExtension from the Univention shell library now allows the option umcmessagecatalog. This option can be used to supply translation files in GNU message catalog format for the UMC (53532).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).

Most UCR variable descriptions have been updated and the default values were moved to the new UCR default layer. Due to this move the default for unset values might have changed, e.g. update/check/boot/enabled and update/check/cron/enabled are affected (47860).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).

Due to the updated repository structure, creating a local repository mirror from a UCS 5 DVD has been deprecated. A new local repository will now directly be mirrored from the upstream online repository (53429).
Ignore file ucs-releases.json to prevent it from being removed on local repository clean (53429).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).
The package univention-pkgdb has been migrated to Python 3 (51337).

Permissions to use a SAML service provider in UCS can be configured on a user object or at group objects for all members of the group. The check via the memberOf attribute for group membership was not done case insensitive (53723).
The Single-Sign-On login page was not affected by the &ucsUCRV; ucs/web/theme (53533).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
The descriptions of email related attributes have been improved (46080).
The Python 2 compatibility of the UCR module self-service-acl.py has been restored (53459).
A light theme for UCS web interfaces has been implemented (53390).
The DH parameters for Dovecot are now correctly created. The Managesieve service could not be used with TLS before (53994).
Server password change now logs timestamps (53182).
Time-stamps have been added to the log output of the server password change call (53182).
The &ucsUDL; module listfilter.py did not respect the &ucsUCRV; mail/postfix/policy/listfilter/use_sasl_username=yes when it is executed with the option --test (53463).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).
The package univention-printserver has been migrated to Python 3 (51335).
The package univention-apache has been migrated to Python 3 (53359).
Server password change now logs timestamps (53182).
Activate default configuration in /etc/freeradius/3.0/sites-available (53712).
The correct file keytab is now used by squid for Kerberos authentication (53648).
Timeout SSL certificate download after 10 minutes (51776).
Server password change now logs timestamps (53182).
The theming has been adjusted for the usage in &ucsUAS; (53665).
Update package ldb for samba 4.13.14 (54013).
Package univention-samba4-backup has been fixed (53438).
Update Samba to 4.13.14 (effectively) (54013).
Server password change now logs timestamps (53182).
An error in the listener samba-shares.py is prevented during the removal of shares with assigned NT ACLs (53414).
Errors in the Python 3 migration of the listener samba-shares.py have been corrected (53458).
Add username map script for use when Samba is configured as domain member (54013).
The UCR module for Samba share restrictions did not quote the spaces inside share names like the samba listener does (53828).
An error in the Python 3 migration has been fixed which causes that the AD takeover was not possible if the AD Domain contained objects with attributes mail or proxyAddresses (53466).
Server password change now logs timestamps (53182).

The &ucsS4C; only deletes/adds objects now if they have the corresponding attribute entryUUID/objectGUID. If a new object with the same DN as an old one is created, the S4 Connector treats them now correctly as different objects (50593).
The script /usr/share/univention-s4-connector/msgpo.py now supports the arguments --binddn and --bindpwdfile, which have been accidently removed in UCS 5.0 (53705).
Invalid values in the LDAP attribute sambaNTPassword are now ignored instead of triggering a traceback (53757).
The Nagios check for univention-ad-connector reported a false positive if multiple ad-connector instances were running (53340).
The package univention-home-mounter has been migrated to Python 3 (53344).
The package univention-ldap-overlay-memberof has been migrated to Python 3 (53356).
The package univention-ssh has been migrated to Python 3 (53342).
The package univention-admingrp-user-passwordreset has been migrated to Python 3 (53354).
univention-ipcalc6 has been converted to Python 3 (53345).
The deprecated univention-ipcalc has been removed (22511).

A SAML service provider configuration can now contain an array of attributes in the option case_insensitive_attributes when using an authorize:Authorize filter. These attributes will be compared case insensitive (53723).

The function ucs_registerLDAPExtension from the Univention shell library now allows the option umcmessagecatalog. This option can be used to supply translation files in GNU message catalog format for the UMC (53532).

Standard streams could be set to non inheritable within the daemon context. Which means child process did not have any standard streams. This made it impossible to use the UMC join module to join or rejoin a UCS server (53181).
